titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on 1,3,5-triazine-2,4,6-triamine, polymer with formaldehyde.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 4/26/2012--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on 1,3,5-triazine-2,4,6-triamine, polymer with formaldehyde.
